The total after net sales, fees, adjustments amount are combined.

The amount of gross sales refunded to customers.

Seller discounts are the total amount of discounts funded by the seller. These include:
i) Discounts funded by the seller through the seller's promotions (Product Discount, Flash Deal, Buy More Save More, Voucher and Bundle Deal)
ii) Seller's portion of a co-funded voucher discount during the seller's participation in co-funding campaigns
iii) Discounts funded by the seller during a campaign
Discounts refunded to the seller.
The debits and credits related to shipping.

column1: Fulfilled by TikTok Shop (FBT) shipping fee
column2: The shipping fee carried by the seller for orders fulfilled by TikTok.
The fee incurred for packages requiring signature confirmation services
The shipping insurance fee incurred by the seller for purchasing additional TikTok shipping insurance services.
The shipping fee incurred by the customer based on the product weight you uploaded.
The refunded amount of customer-paid shipping fees deducted from your account.
The shipping fee incentive provided by TikTok Shop.
The shipping fee incentive amount deducted from your account for refunded orders due to a seller fault.
The shipping fee subsidy provided by TikTok Shop for orders fulfilled by seller themselves.
The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of returns.
The shipping fee carried by the seller for orders fulfilled by TikTok. Since Aug 26th, will used to replace previous "Fulfilled by TikTok shop(FBT) shipping fee" field

Starting Aug 26, 2024, we're updating our rate structure and introducing a new billing item, "Customer shipping fee offset." Although included on FBT invoices, it will not lead to any net charges for sellers. Any shipping fees paid by the customer or the platform will be debited and forwarded to TikTok Shop.

From Aug 26, 2024 to Dec 31, 2024, we will provide additional logistics incentives for sellers that have registered for the co-funded free shipping program. Negative amounts mean a clawback of the incentives given.
Fees charged for using TikTok Shop services, such as Tiktok shop commission, and affiliate commission.

Transaction Fee is a service fee charged for processing successful orders in TikTok Shop.Transaction Fee is a non-refundable fee, and is charged at 0.3USD plus a percentage of the customer paid price per transaction.(For orders placed before April 3, 2023, 0:00 AM UTC-04:00, New York Time)
The referral fee is an amount charged for processing successful orders in TikTok Shop. (For orders placed after April 3, 2023, 0:00 AM UTC-04:00, New York Time)
Refunds or returns will incur a 20% refund administration fee deduction from the total refunded referral fee amount.
The price the customer actually paid for the product (product sale price minus any seller discount) multiplied by the commission percentage.
The amount the customer paid for the product (product price minus seller discounts) via affiliate partner's links multiplied by the affiliate partner commission rate.
The adjustment amount.
Reason of the adjustment.
Orders related to the adjustments, if any.
Explanation

The adjustment resulting from a difference between the required shipping fee and the amount paid by the seller or the mistake in the shipping fee paid by the seller, such as a change in weight or dimensions.
The reimbursement paid by TikTok Shop for losses due to logistics-related issues or for the seller's participation in the platform campaign.
The shipping fee incurred by the seller for using TikTok shipping services.
The reimbursement paid by TikTok Shop for losses due to the return/refund request rules or other issues.
The deduction to cover the cost of buyer's losses for the unpleasant experience of the buyer due to an issue that is the seller's responsibility.
Adjustment when there is a difference between the required TikTok fees and the amount paid by the seller.
Adjustment when there is a difference between the required fee for marketing activities and the amount paid by the seller.
An amount was deducted from your settlement account to cover a policy violation deduction as you have a negative shop balance.

A chargeback is a fund reversal when the customer disputes a transaction and requests a refund directly from their financial institution or card issuer. Sellers are liable for the chargeback loss and any related fees if they receive chargeback claims due to suspicious activities. You can dispute a chargeback claim with supporting documents.
Adjustments for other reasons.

column1: Top up ads balance using GMV payments
column2: The settlement amount will be used to pay for your advertisement if you open 'auto pay ads with shop GMV'
This fee covers all in-warehouse expenses incurred in the Fulfilled by TikTok service, such as storage and handling costs.
The total amount paid by the customer.
The exact amount refunded to the customer.
Seller's portion of a co-funded voucher discount during the seller's participation in co-funding campaigns.
The discount amount refunded to the seller derived from the seller's portion of a co-funded voucher during the seller's participation in co-funding campaigns.

Platform discounts are the total amount of discounts funded by the platform (TikTok Shop). These include:

i) Discounts funded by the platform through Platform's Direct Subsidy, Platform Flash Deal, Platform Buy More Save More and Platform Voucher.
ii) The platform's portion of a co-funded voucher discount during co-funding campaigns.

The discount amount returned to the platform. This includes:

i) Discounts funded by the platform through Platform's Direct Subsidy, Platform Flash Deal, Platform Buy More Save More and Platform Voucher.
ii) The platform's portion of a co-funded Voucher discount during co-funding Campaigns.
The platform's portion of a co-funded voucher discount during co-funding campaigns.
The discount amount refunded to the platform derived from the platform's portion of a co-funded voucher during co-funding campaigns.
The sales tax collected from the buyer for the product and delivery.
If the purchase is refunded, the sales tax that was applied will be returned to the buyer.

The retail delivery fee is collected and remitted by the TikTok Shop. It applies to all deliveries by motor vehicle to a location in Colorado with at least one item of tangible personal property that is subject to state sales or use tax.
If the purchase is refunded, the retail delivery fee that was applied will be returned to the buyer.
Order's original shipping fee the customer needs to paid.
The shipping fee discount provided by sellers.
